author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Moving from Skirmish to Firefight and now to Epic, Mantic Game's sci-fi franchises now span all the scales of gaming. Bob is back with us both having painted parts of his kickstarter pledge to try the game out. I'm piloting the zombified PLAGUE and he is taking on the chittering hordes of Veer-Myn. Let's check it out! 

Thanks to Bob for the models to review!

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

GMG T-Shirts and Hoodies HERE: https://shop.spreadshirt.ca/guerrillaminiaturegame
title: Let's Play! - EPIC: Warpath by Mantic Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Nine! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Antimatter Games  has spent the last fifteen years creating, expanding and developing their world beneath a world. Set in a 17th Century where the discovery of the Shadow Sea below a frozon continent causes a gold rush of aquatic conflict, Deep Wars is one of the original Indie Skirmish games to grow and develop online. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebooks in digital  HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/en/product/106095/deepwars-rulebook-version-3-0?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 049 - DEEPWARS  3E by Antimatter Games
